scripts.test: echo 'Waiting 15 seconds before continuing...' && sleep 15 && mocha --exit --timeout 10000 --retries 2 --recursive tests
scripts.lint: eslint --format codeframe httpserv/server_httpserv.js imed/server_imed.js obse/server_obse.js orig/server_orig.js
scripts.lint-report: eslint --format codeframe imed/server_imed.js obse/server_obse.js orig/server_orig.js > tests/lint-report.md
